title: Zero as an Exponent
text: Any nonzero expression or number raised to the power of $$0$$ is equal to $$1$$. For example, $$5^0=1$$.
speech: Any nonzero expression or number raised to the power of  0  is equal to  1 . For example,  5 to the 0 is equal to 1 .
pacedSpeech: Any nonzero expression or number raised to the power of   0
. For example,   5 to the 0 is equal to 1
